metadata.title: CVE-2018-16982 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - low
metadata.description: Open Chinese Convert (OpenCC) 1.0.5 allows attackers to cause a denial ofservice (segmentation fault) because BinaryDict::NewFromFile inBinaryDict.cpp may have out-of-bounds keyOffset and valueOffset values viaa crafted .ocd file.

criterions.comment: opencc: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
